verses.name: Isaiah 25:10
verses.text: For in this mountain shall the hand of the Lord rest, and Moab shall be trodden down under him, even as straw is trodden down for the dunghill.

verses.name: Isaiah 25:11
verses.text: And he shall spread forth his hands in the midst of them, as he that swimmeth spreadeth forth his hands to swim: and he shall bring down their pride together with the spoils of their hands.

verses.name: Isaiah 25:12
verses.text: And the fortress of the high fort of thy walls shall he bring down, lay low, and bring to the ground, even to the dust.
